title: I don't think Oracles should be acquirable using Kleptomancy
body: It was removed for a reason.

replies.body: When I heard it was coming I felt the same, but it turns out the duration is so reduced it is essentially a "free" red trinket use.
Note how it barely lasts 20 seconds, and is essentially an oracle alteration, but as a consumable.
I don't think champions should have stealth that lasts for more than 4 seconds but you know ... we still got that kinda crap
